thread.title: Shashank Manohar will do a good job as BCCI President: Sourav Ganguly
thread.title_full: Shashank Manohar will do a good job as BCCI President: Sourav Ganguly - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shashank Manohar will do a good job as BCCI President: Sourav Ganguly
text:
Ahead of Board of Control for Cricket in India's (BCCI) special general meeting today, former India skipper Sourav Ganguly said he believes Shashank Manohar , who has emerged as the sole candidate for the board's top post will do a good job.
*Sourav Ganguly*
The post of President fell vacant after death of incumbent Jagmohan ... Â»
